title.text: NATURAL LANGUAGE TEXT SEGMENTATION TECHNIQUES APPLIED TO THE AUTOMATIC COMPILATION OF PRINTED SUBJECT INDEXES AND FOR ONLINE DATABASE ACCESS

entities.text: NATURAL LANGUAGE TEXT SEGMENTATION TECHNIQUES APPLIED

abstractContent.text: The nature of the problem and earlier approaches to the automatic compilation of printed subject indexes are reviewed and illustrated.

entities.text: automatic compilation of printed subject indexes

abstractContent.text: A simple method is described for the de~ection of semantically self-contained word phrase segments in title-like texts.
The method is based on a predetermined list of acceptable types of nominative syntactic patterns which can be recognized using a small domain-independent dictionary.
